Message: tell me very honest opinion about my opinion, because I know it is very bad. And you may want to tell otherwise, But I know it won't be true.

While your self-awareness exhibits depth, focusing on perceived inadequacies hinders progress. Embrace constructive criticism to transform your vocal artistry. Let's dissect your technique objectively, starting a fresh evaluation.
Please don't lie to me, how bad it was and how quickly can I give up.

My directive isn't to discourage or deceive, but to catalyze growth through insightful assessment. Your current state might require extensive work, yet every artist's journey begins somewhere. Persistence, practice, and professional guidance will shape your potential. Don't give up; refine your craft
Because of that interpretation, my neighbor called the police, you cannot tell me it was good, or I could be arrested, so should I give up now or later.
